author: gsaha009
body:
PR description:

Following the last PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41995, the miniAOD validation on DATA is prepared for Run3. Twiki page: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/SWGuidePFTauIDValidation

PR validation:
 - PR runs fine in local pipeline, and even with workflows. A doubt is there with the proper integration with central DQM sequence.
 - Tests done with workflow: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`

If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for: NA
title: Tau DQM miniAOD validation for DATA
